titles.title: A bill to extend the pilot program of the Department of Veterans Affairs on acceptance by the Department of donated facilities and related improvements.
CHIP IN for Veterans Act
CHIP IN for Veterans Act
Communities Helping Invest through Property and Improvements Needed for Veterans Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Communities Helping Invest through Property and Improvements Needed for Veterans Act or the CHIP IN for Veterans Act
This bill extends from 5 to 10 years the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) pilot program under which the VA may accept donations of property or facilities from specified entities (e.g., state or local authorities).
